steps.name: Given user has already logged in to application
When User clicks on the Admin tab from the menu
And Admin panel page should display Admin / User Management options
When User enters username "smith12345" in the search field
And User enters employee name "Sarah Smith"
And User clicks on Reset button
Then All search fields should be cleared
